abstrac: Stop chasing paper and start chasing opportunity!
bio: Innovative Administrative Solutions is a small female owned, Arizona based virtual administrative services company. By offering 20+ years of experience in the roles of Executive/Administrative Assistants/Office Managers you are assured a high quality of service and commitment by a company with a deep passion for and understanding of small business.

Our hours of operation are Monday-Friday form 9am to 5pm (MST). 

Preferred method of contact is via email or Skype.

Payment terms (Guru.com specific), half of estimated project cost is due up front. Once project is half completed, a request for remaining payment will be sent prior to project completion.

bio:
Blu Beans have been offering complete web design & development solutions to clients since 2010. We are based in Bhopal, India. We are having a team of 9 talented professionals. Our main focus is to clearly understand the core business visions of our clients, in order to bring about the transcending effect on their websites 

Specialties • Customized web design solutions • Customized web programming • Open source CMS and shopping cart integration • Customized CMS and shopping cart development • Customized software development • Flash animation • Web graphics • Flash intro designs • 2D character designing • Brochure designing Logo design • Flash banners • Landing Design • Email Design • Newsletter Design 


We will be thankful if you give us opportunity. 

With Warm Regards, BluBeans Team Email- work@blubeans.com Skype- blu.beans

We are generally very flexible, project-specific and could vary depending on the technology, complexity, resource requirements and duration of the project. However, as a standard, we would prefer payments along the following payment plans:

:: For project upto $1000 
50% as advance, along with selection. 
50% (remaining) on total completion.

:: For projects over $1000 
40% as advance along with selection
60% (remaining) on total completion. 

Payment Method:
Guru Escrow.

We assure 24 hours turn around on emails regarding development & progress status. Custom arrangements can be made for any client, and We are very flexible and easy to work with. 

To get a free quote, mail us to work@blubeans.com
Thanks!

bio:
I have experience doing voiceovers, and I'm a singer-songwriter with two new singles, "Never the Same Again" and "The Thorns of the Rose" available at www.cdbaby.com/cd/ladylaraine. I also two award-winning videos of the same name, located at www.youtube.com/watch?v-fvKkwiLehYE ("Never the Same Again") and at www.youtube.com/watch?v=0mJ87yx2yA ("The Thorns of the Rose.")  I am interested in voice over work, writing commerically (ie: jingles, films, etc.) and scriptwriting for advertising, radio, television, and films.  
    I am the author of the action-thriller, The Rise and Fall of the Witch on the Bayou (Publish America, Inc., 2001) and three-time Finalist with VH-1's Song of the Year international songwriting contest.  (See www.songoftheyear.com).  I have a B.A.in journalism and a CA teaching credential.  I am a retired magnet-drama third grade teacher.  My strength is my creativity and sensitivity ,command of the English language, talents in music, drama, broadcasting, and writing, which God has blessed me with to use for His glory.   I'm an excellent reader--and I love to bring words to life!
I work from home only.  I expect to be paid upfront for my time and effort, according to the Guru guidelines.
